messages.message:
Cypress crafting sandboxes are broken. Tried updating the `cypress-ci` template with the new `config` files for docker + aws, but still broken.

Failing to spin up because the compiled Cypress image is using some script (probs `ecr-login` ) is failing to read `/var/run/sandbox/fs/secrets/owner/ecr-login`. I'm guessing we removed the shared secret from Crafting?

Even the Crafting CI specific fix is no longer working (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1753118410980869).
I'm going to skip Cypress CI until we have the ibdev-backend switchover ready.
Yes, ty Paul. Xindi is working on it but it will take a week or so.
ooks like the cypress-ci template is using a workspace binary, which was deleted in this pr: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71714
